label: Youtube
description: Arcade.dev LLM tools for searching for YouTube videos"

tools.name: GetYoutubeVideoDetails
tools.description: Get details about a YouTube video.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: The ID of the YouTube video to get details about. E.g. 'dQw4w9WgXcQ'.

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: 2-character language code to search for. E.g. 'en' for English. Defaults to 'en'.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: 2-character country code to search for. E.g. 'us' for United States. Defaults to 'None'.

tools.name: SearchForVideos
tools.description: Search for YouTube videos related to the query.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: The keywords to search for. E.g. 'Python tutorial'.

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: 2-character language code to search for. E.g. 'en' for English. Defaults to 'en'.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: 2-character country code to search for. E.g. 'us' for United States. Defaults to 'None'.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token to use for pagination. Defaults to `None` (start from the first page).

output.description: List of YouTube videos related to the query.

summary:
Arcade.dev provides a toolkit for interacting with YouTube, enabling developers to search for videos and retrieve video details seamlessly. This toolkit simplifies tasks related to enhancing applications with YouTube content.

**Capabilities**  
- Search for videos based on specific queries  
- Retrieve detailed information about YouTube videos  
- Supports integration of YouTube functionalities into applications  
- Allows quick access to video data for enhanced user experiences  

**OAuth**  
- No OAuth authentication required. 

**Secrets**  
- API Key: Use the `SERP_API_KEY` to authenticate API requests for video data.
